mapper.sql: id, wid, fenlei, file_name, file_path, file_state, yuliu,uid, createTime, createName, updateTime, updateName,auditorState
mapper.select:
select wtfi.id, wid, fenlei, file_name, file_path, file_state, uid, auditorState, wa.auditor_id from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_file wtfi, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_auditor wa
wtfi.id = wa.object_id AND objectType = 3
and wid = #{wid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and fenlei=2
and file_name like concat('%',#{fileName},'%')
group by id desc

select wtfi.id, wid, fenlei, file_name, file_path, file_state, uid, auditorState, wa.auditor_id from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_file wtfi, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_auditor wa
wtfi.id = wa.object_id AND objectType = 2
and wid = #{wid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and fenlei=1
and file_name like concat('%',#{fileName},'%')
group by id desc

select wtfi.id, wid, fenlei, file_name, file_path, file_state, uid, auditorState, wa.auditor_id from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_file wtfi, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_auditor wa where wtfi.id = wa.object_id AND objectType = 2 and wtfi.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_wenti_file
wid = #{wid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fenlei = #{fenlei,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_state = #{fileState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yuliu = #{yuliu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auditorState = #{auditorState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
